title: Bank of America to reduce overdraft fees this spring - Reuters
description: Bank of America (BAC.N), the second-largest U.S. bank, is reducing overdraft fees from $35 to $10 starting in May, the bank said in a news release on Tuesday.

title: Bank of America to staff: Get a booster, we'll give a food bank $100 - Reuters.com
description: Bank of America Corp told workers on Wednesday it will donate $100 to local food banks for every one of its employees who gets a COVID-19 vaccine booster shot and notifies the bank before Jan. 31, according to a memo seen by Reuters.
